A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The character archs for Kylo and Rey were excellent. The handful of sequences that were good were great.  \n\nHowever\, this movie had distracting cheap humor\, had ridiculous sub plots\, and did nothing to build on The Force Awakens.  Laura Dern and Benny Del Toro's characters were unlikeable to the core.  The writing is SO bad. I could just go on and on.
